General.Name: Dabomb Protein
General.Description: DaBomb Protein Corp. produces and supplies plant peptides in Asia. It offers pet healthcare products under the Lactotides name; plant probiotic peptides under the Agrigood name; bio stimulants under the Dabomb Ti name; antibiotics-free feed under the DaBomb-p (Aqua) and DaBomb-p (Livestock) names; and immune-synbiotic boosters under the DaBomb Live name. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Tainan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.52, Gongye 3rd Road, Tainan City, Taiwan, 709
